embeds.description: The available commands, their usage, and examples are seen below. Make sure to use the prefix `~` in using the commands.

fields.name: `~help`
fields.value: Dispalys a list of usable commands.

fields.name: `~join <class_code> <section>`
fields.value:
Lets you join a class and adds you to the role of the class. Note that there should be no space in the class code.
Example: `~join ENGG101.01 A`

fields.name: `~leave <class_code> <section>`
fields.value:
Lets you leave the class and the role associated with it. Note that there should be no space in the class code.
Example: `~leave ENGG101.01 A`

fields.name: `~clear`
fields.value: Clears your from all your classes and roles. You automatically leave all of your classes. This command is ideally used after a semester.

fields.name: `~classes~`
fields.value: This displays all your classes and the information associated with them.

fields.name: `~zoom <class_code> <section> <zoom_link>`
fields.value:
Adds the zoom link to the class for easier access.
Example: `~zoom ENGG101.01 A https://ateneo-edu.zoom.us/j/1234?pwd=5678
